# Web Final Cheat Sheet

Compact exam-prep notes for UIU CSE4165 (Web Programming). Includes a consolidated cheatsheet, likely question patterns, and past-exam analysis with updated Summer 2024 additions.

## Contents
- cheatsheet-template.md — Code templates for PHP, JS, SQL + barebones setup
- likely-questions.md — High-probability patterns across recent exams
- past-questions-analysis.md — Recurring topics and summaries by exam
- past questions/ — Source PDFs for past papers

## Quick Start
Open the markdown files in any editor. The cheatsheet is designed to be printed or used as a quick in-exam reference.

## Notes
- Templates are intentionally minimal to reduce time during exams.
- Use the separators (---) as rough page boundaries when printing.
